patterns_discovered: Dynamic component loading with Next.js dynamic import
Client-side rendering for specific components using SSR false
Modular page composition using multiple section components
gotchas_discovered: Heavy use of dynamic imports might impact initial page load performance
Large number of imports from different components could create complex dependency management
recommendations: Consider performance optimization for dynamically imported components
Review component size and potential for code splitting
Analyze impact of multiple dynamic imports on initial page load time
